metadata.description: Complete information on data collection, usage, and protection, cookies, and third-party services in compliance with privacy regulations.

introduction.paragraph1: Mol Class is committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when using our website and educational chemistry services.
introduction.paragraph2: This policy complies with LGPD, GDPR, CCPA, and other applicable regulations, with transparency and respect for your rights.

technicalData.title: Technical Data
technicalData.legalBasis: Legal basis: Legitimate interest for service operation and security
technicalData.purpose: Purpose: Ensure proper operation and security of our educational platform

educationalData.title: Educational Data
typesList: Interactions with chemistry calculators and tools
Calculation history (stored locally in the browser)
Usage patterns of features and performance metrics
educationalData.legalBasis: Legal basis: Consent and legitimate interest for service improvement
educationalData.purpose: Purpose: Personalize the learning experience and enhance educational tools

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.essentialBasis: Legal basis: Necessary for service operation (no consent required)
analyticsList: Google Analytics: traffic and behavior analysis
Microsoft Clarity: experience analysis and session recordings
cookies.analyticsBasis: Legal basis: Consent (may be revoked at any time)
cookies.purpose: Purpose: Improve user experience and platform performance
cookies.consent: Consent: You can manage cookie preferences in our consent banner
cookies.disclaimer: Analytics cookies are optional and do not affect the core functionality of educational tools.
cookies.management: You can manage your cookie preferences through our banner or browser settings. Disabling analytics cookies does not affect the main functionality of educational tools.

registrationData.title: Registration Data
registrationData.legalBasis: Legal basis: Consent and contract execution
registrationData.purpose: Purpose: Provide personalized services and account management

generalPolicy.title: General Policy
items: We do not intentionally collect data from children under 13 years old
If identified, such data will be promptly deleted
Parents/guardians should supervise minors' online activities

retention.intro: We retain your personal data only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy:
items: Technical data: up to 2 years for security and analytics
Educational data: until account deletion or request
Cookie data: according to our cookie policy (up to 26 months for analytics)
Communication data: up to 3 years for user support
retention.note: Note: Some data may be retained longer if required by law or for legitimate purposes, such as security incident investigations.

rights.lgpdGdpr: Under applicable privacy laws (LGPD, GDPR, CCPA, etc.), you have the following rights:
rights.contact: Contact us at molclassapp@gmail.com with your request
rights.response: We will respond within the timeframe required by applicable law (generally 30 days for GDPR, 45 days for CCPA).
list: Access: Know which personal data we maintain about you
Deletion: Request deletion of your personal data
Portability: Receive your data in a structured format
Objection: Object to certain types of processing
Restriction: Limit how we process your data
Withdrawal of Consent: Withdraw consent at any time
Non-Discrimination: Not be discriminated against for exercising privacy rights

thirdParty.intro: We use the following trusted third-party services:
thirdParty.legalBasis: Legal basis: Legitimate interest for service improvement and consent for analytics
thirdParty.control: You can control data sharing with third parties through our cookie consent banner
thirdParty.disclaimer: Each third-party service has its own privacy policy governing its data processing practices
thirdParty.userAction: To manage third-party preferences, use the cookie banner

banner.title: Cookie Management
banner.intro: Our consent banner allows you to:
list: Access details of the privacy policy and terms of use

changes.intro: We may update this Policy to reflect legal, technological, or service changes.
items: The date of the last update will always be indicated at the top
Important changes will be communicated on the site or by email (when applicable)
Continued use after changes implies acceptance of the updates
We recommend reviewing this policy periodically

contact.intro: To exercise your rights, ask questions, or report concerns, contact us:
contact.subject: Privacy and Data Protection
